page.title: 16 EDUCATION.
page.content: { }Cyprus Terrace School is an infant school with 87 children starting at 5 and leaving at 7, when they go on to other school. It was built in 1896. It has 3 classes with 2 full time and 2 part time teachers. The school will soon be closed as a new one will be built. Our Lady's is a catholic school built in 1968. It has 191 children aged 5 to 11 years.The school was in Higher Church Street since 1823. Lampard Vachell was opened in 1968 for children with learning difficulties.There are 120 children from 5 to 17 years including a few weekly boarders. The new school in Newport will be opened in September 1986. They plan for 130 children,rising to 270.The age range will be 5-11
